name: Gunthrow
description:
Gunthrow

You have one big gun to fight enemies. Luckily you are super strong, so you can hold it above your head and throw it upwards. Those enemies won't know what hit them!

  • Shoot enemies in this endless side-scroller
  • Throw your gun into the air to shoot from above
  • You die when you or your gun touches an enemy. Do you play it safe or do you go for those extra points?
  • Made in three hours for the Trijam #137!

Can you beat my highscore of 3900?

All assets made by me, except for the font (made by Jakob Fischer at www.pizzadude.dk).
